actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To abolish the franking privilege for the House of Representatives and to establish a spending allowance for postage for official mail of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Abolishes the franking privilege with respect to the House of Representatives. Establishes a spending allowance for postage for official mail of the House to be used for purchasing stamps and other postage rather than to pay for franked mail.

titles.title: To abolish the franking privilege for the House of Representatives and to establish a spending allowance for postage for official mail of the House of Representatives.
